Package gr.uop

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPos
    holds coordinates of a board position
    BoardTilePos
    coordinates of a board domino tile (2 squares) and landscape type of each square
    Client
    main Client class extends Application
    Client2
    extends Client for playing and debugging multiple clients
    Client3
    extends Client for playing and debugging multiple clients
    Client4
    extends Client for playing and debugging multiple clients
    CommMessages
    Publishes messages ServerActions and ClientActions Enums , communications verbs (like http/smtp verbs)
    KingTile  
    Player
    holds palyer information of a client Each King is another player
    PlayerClient
    handles client socket communication with server and provides critical fields for player and game
    Square
    represents one square (landscape) in a domino tile each domino tile has two squares (landscapes) a spacial landscape of type castle is used for castle square on board
    Tile
    represents a domino tile which consists of two landscapes (squares)
    Tile.SquareInfoFields  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommMessages.ClientActions
    client messages verbs
    CommMessages.GameStatus
    game status enums NOT USEFULL for Client
    CommMessages.ServerActions
    server messages verbs
    Square.LandscapeType
    enum for square landscape type FARM, FIELD, FOREST, LAKE, LAND, ROCKS, CASTLE,UNKNWON
    Square.SquareColor
    to be discarded , enum for square colors according to landscape, YELLOW, GREEN, GRAY, BLUE, LIGHTGRAY, BROWN, RED, WHITE, BLACK
    Square.SquareType
    enum for square types LANDSCAPE, CASTLE, EMPTY
